resources.string: Call Us from Mon to Fri between 12 pm to 10 pm

" Quaint and comfortable, Kavik Restaurant, Auckland is one of those rare spaces that is as intimate as it is spacious. Main Bar The largest space at Restaurant. Perfect for a large birthday or celebration while still retaining that personal and private touch Big screen TV for all your favourite sporting occasions; Stage and PA upon request; Accommodates 12-15 people for Lunch and Dinner The Dining Floor A private space perfect for a seated meal or reception. With the choice of 5 different menu options or we can tailor a menu that suits your own budget or requirements. Private area Big screen TV for all your favourite sporting occasions Accommodates 4 to 5 people for a seated meal The Conservatory With a private outdoor area and smoking facilities, The Conservatory is perfect for quiet drinks with friends or that notso-large birthday celebration. Big screen TV for all your favourite sporting occasions Outdoor heating Smoking area Accommodates 3 people for Dinner"
